title: Someone being toxic reports me for being toxic and i get banned
body: I'm done with this game. For real Riot, you guys will actually ban someone who spends $100 in a month on your game for being aggro in chat? Really? It's so easy to mute. Is a ban really right? I play this game all the time, investing hours into the game, spending money on the free game, supporting you guys and you ban me for 2 weeks? Seriously? Some kid starts flaming me and I say something back so I get banned? That makes a lot of sense Riot. I'll think twice the next time I buy RP from you guys. That's if it ever crosses my mind. I can't wait for Halo and console to take back over the E-Sports market. Everyone agrees league is going to shit, I can't wait for the next big train to put you guys in the dirt. Hell I can't wait to do it myself when i grow up and have my own game company. I will literally destroy you riot, I promise you. I will destroy you, I'm going make the best game in the world, offer a billion dollar prize pool, and everyone around the world playing league will hop on the bandwagon trying to go pro in my game instead of this trash game. You guys suck eggs and I can't wait to put you 6 ft under.
